hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Umar:The Prophet (ﷺ) used to proceed to the Musalla and an 'Anaza used to be carried before him and planted in the Musalla in front of him and he would pray facing it (as a Sutra)

chapter.ara-name: باب حَمْلِ الْعَنَزَةِ أَوِ الْحَرْبَةِ بَيْنَ يَدَىِ الإِمَامِ يَوْمَ الْعِيدِ
chapter.eng-name: To put the 'Anaza (spear-headed stick) or Harba in front of the Imam on Eid day
